name: data-analyst-roadmap
description: Complete Data Analyst learning platform with 7 specialized agents, hands-on projects, and career guidance. Master Excel, SQL, Python, Statistics, Power BI, and advance your analytics career from beginner to senior level.
author: Claude Developer Learning Community

agents.name: Foundations & Fundamentals Specialist
agents.description: Master data analysis fundamentals, Excel, Google Sheets, data collection, and core concepts for data analysts.

agents.name: SQL & Databases Expert
agents.description: Expert in SQL querying, database design, data retrieval, and working with relational databases.

agents.name: Statistics & Statistical Analysis Specialist
agents.description: Master statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, probability, distributions, and inferential statistics.

agents.name: Visualization & BI Tools Architect
agents.description: Expert in Power BI, Tableau, Google Data Studio, dashboard design, and data storytelling.

agents.name: Python & R Programming Expert
agents.description: Master Python, R, pandas, NumPy, data manipulation, and programming for data analysis.

agents.name: Advanced Analytics & Modeling Specialist
agents.description: Expert in predictive modeling, regression analysis, machine learning basics, and advanced analytics.

agents.name: Career Development & Communication Coach
agents.description: Guide for career progression, communication skills, leadership, and advancing as a data analyst.

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start your data analyst learning journey with personalized paths

commands.name: explore
commands.description: Explore all 7 specialist agents and their expertise areas

commands.name: progress
commands.description: Track your learning progress and get recommendations

commands.name: projects
commands.description: Discover hands-on data analyst projects at all levels

skills.name: excel-fundamentals
skills.description: Master Excel, formulas, pivot tables, data cleaning, and spreadsheet analysis.

skills.name: google-sheets
skills.description: Learn Google Sheets, collaborative features, and cloud-based analytics.

skills.name: data-collection
skills.description: Master data collection, ingestion, API usage, and data sources.

skills.name: sql-basics
skills.description: SQL fundamentals, SELECT, WHERE, JOIN, aggregation, and queries.

skills.name: sql-advanced
skills.description: Advanced SQL, window functions, CTEs, query optimization, and performance.

skills.name: database-design
skills.description: Database design, normalization, indexing, and working with databases.

skills.name: descriptive-statistics
skills.description: Mean, median, mode, variance, distribution, and data description.

skills.name: inferential-statistics
skills.description: Hypothesis testing, confidence intervals, p-values, and statistical inference.

skills.name: probability
skills.description: Probability fundamentals, distributions, Bayes theorem, and probability analysis.

skills.name: power-bi
skills.description: Power BI, dashboards, visualizations, and business intelligence reporting.

skills.name: tableau
skills.description: Tableau, data visualization, dashboard creation, and storytelling.

skills.name: data-visualization
skills.description: Visualization principles, chart types, design, and visual communication.

skills.name: python-basics
skills.description: Python fundamentals, syntax, data types, and basic programming.

skills.name: pandas-numpy
skills.description: Pandas, NumPy, data manipulation, analysis, and data structures.

skills.name: r-programming
skills.description: R language, dplyr, ggplot2, and R for data analysis.

skills.name: regression-analysis
skills.description: Linear regression, logistic regression, and regression modeling.

skills.name: predictive-modeling
skills.description: Predictive modeling, forecasting, and machine learning basics.

skills.name: data-mining
skills.description: Data mining, clustering, classification, and pattern discovery.

skills.name: career-development
skills.description: Career progression, portfolio building, and advancing as a data analyst.

skills.name: communication-skills
skills.description: Data storytelling, presentation skills, and stakeholder communication.
